_instructions.howToUpdate: Add new projects to the 'projects' array below. Each project should follow the structure defined here.

structure.title: Project title - max 30 characters (required)
structure.subtitle: Brief subtitle like 'coded, designed' - max 20 characters (optional)
structure.description: Project description - MAX 80 CHARACTERS for best display (required)
structure.image: Image URL - not displayed but kept for reference (optional)
structure.technologies: Array of tech stack items - max 4 items recommended (required)

_instructions.note: Keep descriptions concise and impactful. Focus on what the project does, not how.

projects.title: Resume Builder
projects.subtitle: coded, designed
projects.description: Full-stack web app for creating ATS-friendly resumes with live preview and PDF export.
